Feature Notes:

Arcane Training: Favored class must include arcane spellcasting
Elf Blood: Counts as both elf and human for racial effects
Low-Light Vision: x2 normal distance in poor light

Fly: (dex;cc) 1 (+2) Swim: (str) 1 (+7)

Intelligence Language Adjustment: +2
Intelligence Skill Ranks Adjustment: +2
Keen Senses: +2 Perception
Skill Focus (Fly): +3 Fly
Water Child: +4 Swim
Sociable (Half-Elf): May retry Diplomacy to change attitude after failing by 5 or more
Water Child: May take 10 while swimming/May learn Aquan

Magic
Magic Notes: Arcane Training: +1 caster level on favored class spell trigger and completion items
Notes
Validation Errors:
Half-Elf-Ancestral Arms Alternatives: Ancestral Arms may not be combined with Adaptability, Dual Minded, Integrated, Sociable (Half-Elf), or Water Child
Half-Elf-Arcane Training Alternatives: Arcane Training may not be combined with Multitalented or Water Child
Half-Elf-Dual Minded Alternatives: Dual Minded may not be combined with Adaptability, Ancestral Arms, Integrated, Sociable (Half-Elf), or Water Child
Half-Elf-Integrated Alternatives: Integrated may not be combined with Adaptability, Ancestral Arms, Dual Minded, Sociable (Half-Elf), or Water Child
Half-Elf-Sociable (Half-Elf) Alternatives: Sociable (Half-Elf) may not be combined with Adaptability, Ancestral Arms, Dual Minded, Integrated, or Water Child
Half-Elf-Water Child Alternatives: Water Child may not be combined with Adaptability, Ancestral Arms, Dual Minded, Integrated, Sociable (Half-Elf), Multitalented, or Arcane Training
Selectable Feature Allocation: 2 available vs. 7 allocated
